_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL EGG REPOSITORY - PTERODACTYLEGGS.COM
name: Vanilla Minecraft
author: support@pterodactyl.io
description: Minecraft is a game about placing blocks and going on adventures. Explore randomly generated worlds and build amazing things from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Vanilla MC Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl jq

cd /mnt/server

LATEST_VERSION=`curl -s https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json | jq -r '.latest.release'`
VERSION=${VERSION:-"$LATEST_VERSION"}

echo -e "\nMinecraft Version: $VERSION\n"

CDN_URL=https://serverjars.com/api/fetchJar/vanilla/vanilla/${VERSION}

if [ ! -z "$VANILLA_VERSION" ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading: $CDN_URL\n"
    curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} $CDN_URL
else
    echo -e "Downloading vanilla server jar for version ${VERSION}\n"
    curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} $CDN_URL
fi

echo -e "Done downloading vanilla server jar for version ${VERSION}\n"

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: Server Version
variables.description: The version of Minecraft Vanilla to install. Leave blank to use the latest.

variables.name: Server Memory
variables.description: The amount of memory in MB to allocate to the Java Heap.
